跥字的基本解释

跥
duò
同“跺”。

跥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［duò］
［《集韻》都果切，上果，端。］
亦作“跥1”。
(1)顿足；用脚蹬地。
(2)丢，掷。

跥字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【足字部】　跥； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页1224第21
【集韻】都果切，音朶。【玉篇】行貌。　又吐火切，音妥。義同。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［duò］
["Ji Yun" are all fruit-cut, fruit-on, and fruit-on. ]
Also known as "跥1".
(1) Stun your feet; push the ground with your feet.
(2) Throw, throw.

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Unitary Collection】【Foot Character Department】　跥; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 1224-21
[Jiyun] All fruits are cut and sound. [Jade articles] Appearance.　 Spit the fire again, the sound was correct. The same meaning.
